comment: The <rect> element is a basic SVG shape that draws rectangles, defined by their position, width, and height. The rectangles may have their corners rounded.

attributes.name: rx
attributes.comment: the horizontal corner radius of the rect.

attributes.name: ry
attributes.comment: the vertical corner radius of the rect.

attributes.name: pathLength
attributes.comment: the total length for the circle's circumference, in user units.
